Authors:
Sung-Eun Cho, Susumu Takamatsu, Jamjan Meeboon, Hyeon-Dong
Shin
Title:
Erysiphe magnoliicola, a new powdery mildew on Magnolia
spp.
Keywords:
Erysiphe magnifica, ITS rDNA, Magnoliaceae, molecular
phylogeny
Abstract:
A new powdery mildew species of the genus Erysiphe section
Microsphaera was collected on three species of Magnolia. This fungus was
examined, described, and illustrated as E. magnoliicola sp. nov.
Introduction of a new species was supported by phylogenetic analyses of
ITS and 28S rDNA of Korean and Japanese materials of this fungus. A
comparison of and a synoptic key to the four species of genus Erysiphe
sect. Microsphaera known on Magnolia spp. are provided.
